title: Badge: UX common EN
code:
<gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="s" width="max-content" align-items="flex-start" padding="2xl xl">
  <gds-badge variant="positive">Signed</gds-badge>
  <gds-badge variant="warning">Waiting for signature</gds-badge>
  <gds-badge variant="warning">Waiting for other's signature</gds-badge>
  <gds-badge>Expired</gds-badge>
  <gds-badge>Closed</gds-badge>
  <gds-badge variant="negative">Removed</gds-badge>
</gds-flex>
